name: Save Molly
description:
A game by ThreeBigMan Theo, Link, and Sam!!

This is a completely normal game … for the first 2 minutes. Go through the game to Save Molly while fighting against the computer itself. Be warned, things start falling apart the further you go. Know that all ends are new beginnings, even if you can’t stay to see how they turn out. 

(PS: this is our first game so don’t be harsh please :()

:()    :()   :()

***** (the  following are hints when you get stuck, stop reading if you haven't play the game) *********

1. How to access the hidden file.exe - let Molly help you.

2. The control glitching/not working - guide Molly with the mouse. This is a Windows computer, so why do you expect it to work all the time?

3. Flipped/Upside down scene - you can press space to climb the wall and reach the portal at the end.

4. terminal - read the instruction MORE CAREFULLY you silly

5. Finale - sometimes you just need things to click
